title: FPS drop since 7.13 patch
body:
I have problems with FPS since patch 7.13.
Namely, earlier I had FPS on very high settings between 80-120. Since patch 7.13, my FPS is between 40-50. 
The worst is that in teamfight, FPS falls to 20-30, and it's really frustrating. I can't play at such small FPS, because on the same setting a couple days ago, I had 120 FPS. 
Thumb up to support can see my problem. Ty. 

Sorry for bad English.

replies.body: Sometimes after patches you might need to make a few other updates to your pc as well to make sure everything interacts properly. Double check for any missing driver updates, as well as the rest of the steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and you, should be good to go.

Riot Agent, plz!
Do not excuse to this like... its your fault - update your stuffs and it will be ok. its not new patch fault, its not our fault. So plz...
Get better programmers ffs. There is 2 ways how to code something - just fast brutal way or smooth, without useing unnecessary

 I have decent computer which handdle good games, but this League stuff.... I had constant 140 FPS almoust all game long. And then come this patch - 140 fps at the start and 60 - 70 fps after 1 minute! 
And yes. I did update all drivers apps, like c++ NET AIR DirX, now its 80 from the begining and 50-60 at 1 min. So ty for "GOOD" recomendation.
Do not misunderstand me - this is not get all the salt to Riot - this is real sutuation with all  facts.
